name: SSF8
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 8
subtitle: Sjogren Syndrome
notes: **Note**:  Code history of Sjogren syndrome as documented by the physician or coded in the medical record. Sjogren syndrome is an autoimmune inflammatory disorder of lacrimal and salivary exocrine glands. The syndrome may be associated with another connective tissue disorder such as systemic lupus erythematosus or rheumatoid arthritis.
